title: 197: Haunted Dolls and Murder Mysteries with Roz Drezfalez
itunes:title: 197: Haunted Dolls and Murder Mysteries with Roz Drezfalez
description:
It’s Halloween Season, Broads, and that means it is time for our favorite Roz Drezfalez to enter the Zoom chat! We chat about Halloween amid the pandemic, haunted dolls on Ebay, Jess’ creepy home stories, astral projecting, past life regression, The Bloody Benders, The Derby Poisoner, and much more! Happy Halloween, Spooky Broads! #halloween #fabfitfunpartner


ROZ DREZFALEZ:


“GHOSTED!” podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ghosted-by-roz-drezfalez/id1450864418


PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/Rozdrezfalez


FOLLOW ROZ: https://www.instagram.com/rozdrezfalez/
